SELECT COUNT(*) FROM OBHOTEL_BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{board_type}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OBHOTEL_BOARD (ID, USER_ID, BOARD_TYPE, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITE_DATE, READ_COUNT) VALUES (OBHOTEL_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{user_id}, #{board_type}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 0)
